alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Wrangell; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Petersburg Borough; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 06 at 3:23PM AKDT until October 07 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Glacier Bay, Eastern Chichagof Island, Admiralty Island, City and Borough of Juneau, Petersburg Borough, Western Kupreanof Island and Kuiu Island, Prince of Wales Island and City and Borough of Wrangell. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving and boating conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Early morning aviation activities could be impacted.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Island; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Wrangell; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Petersburg Borough; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
